name: Leading Education
description:
We provide two key services:

Applications
We offer tailored support for applications to UK and US universities, specialising in helping international students demonstrate their full potential. Our services include university selection reports, personal statement assistance, admissions test training and interview preparation.

Research
By providing high school students with the unique opportunity to conduct research supervised by Oxbridge PhDs, we open up world-class education to the most ambitious young minds. We help students to boost their university applications and prepare for the research demands of prestigious institutions.

jobs.title: Head of Product (internship)
jobs.description:
We are looking for an intern to join our rapidly expanding company. Leading Education is a tuition company which specialises in providing international students, particularly those from China, with the guidance necessary to target top universities in the UK.

We are looking for a highly-motivated individual to take an internship with us. This is an opportunity to get right in at the ground floor to an innovative education startup, with a full-time job at the end of the internship for the right candidate.

The traits we require are:
- Excellent organisational skills 
- Complete focus on quality and doing right by our clients
- Relationship building and management
- Exceptional work ethic 
- The desire and ability to go above and beyond in delivering a first-rate client experience
- Deeply caring

This is a people-facing role and so excellent people skills are an absolute must.

Specifically, the role will involve:
- Curating the relationships between tutors and students
- Hiring tutors from Oxford, Cambridge, LSE, UCL and Imperial College
- Potentially making trips to China and other international destinations to further business development
- Developing the consultancy branch of our company
- General administrative support to management

Fluency in Mandarin is a plus, but not necessary.
